metadata.name: Tipsy Turvy
metadata.description:
It was a rainy day in New York & the atmosphere was dreary. I went to the Brooklyn side hoping to get that dream shot of the Brooklyn Bridge at sunset but my chances seemed bleak.  
Dejected as I couldnâ€™t get the shot I visualized, I started heading back to Manhattan.

As I approached the Brooklyn Bridge, a combination of clearing rain clouds & setting sun came together to present the the most resplendent sky I had ever witnessed.  

That evening, the skies of New York were on fire. The asphalt was glistening from freshly fallen rain & the city lights were burning up as the sun was clocking out.
